fxInfo_citation: Bernhard et al. (2015, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2015:13); Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Which of these best describes the involvement of people in civil society organizations(CSOs)?

fxInfo_responses.value: Most associations are state-sponsored, and although a large number of people may be active in them, their participation is not purely voluntary.
Voluntary CSOs exist but few people are active in them.
There are many diverse CSOs, but popular involvement is minimal.
There are many diverse CSOs and it is considered normal for people to be at least occasionally active in at least one of them.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2csprtcpt, *_osp, *_ord
